help-file.title: DETONATE "IMPROVED DETONATE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: N/A Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
This terribly destructive spell cause the victims body to be enveloped in a series of painful focused explosions. If the caster is specialized as a Pyrokinetic, the damage is more focused, and much harder to avoid. Improved Detonate is a spell for a specialized Pyrokinetic.
